articles.title: “Hidden Gem” Fossil Of Dinosaur Skin Preserved Like Glass Reveals It Had Scales And Feathers - IFLScience

articles.title: Move to extend police protest powers ruled unlawful - BBC.com
articles.description: The High Court has ruled the Home Office acted outside of its powers in laws passed last year.

articles.content:

articles.title: Breakthrough therapy improves movement in paralysed patients - Financial Times
articles.description: Clinical study shows better hand and arm function after using non-invasive device to stimulate spinal cord
articles.content:
Delivering electrical stimulation to the spinal cord using a new device can significantly improve hand and arm function in people with severe paralysis, a breakthrough clinical trial has shown.
